text: Middlebury is the shire townTitle 24, Part I, Chapter 1, ยง2 , Vermont Statutes. Accessed 2007-11-01. (county seat) of Addison County, Vermont, United States. The population was 9,152 at the 2020 census. Middlebury is home to Middlebury College and the Henry Sheldon Museum of Vermont History. ==References== Category:Towns in Addison County, Vermont Category:County seats in Vermont
title: Middlebury, Vermont
